tool_description: QR Code Generator API is a RESTful web service that allows developers to generate QR codes on-the-fly. With this API, developers can easily create QR codes for various types of data, including URLs, plain text, phone numbers, and more.  The API accepts a GET request with a single parameter, "data" which is the data you want to encode in the QR code, in the form of a string. The API will then generate the QR code image based on the provided data and return it in the form of a PNG image.  The A...
title: Easy QR Code Generator API

api_list.name: QR Code image_copy
api_list.description: This end points take url as string parameter and return a downloadable image
